question: 汚染
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>dirty</kanji> <kanji>dye</kanji> that's all throughout the sky and makes things gross when it touches them is <vocabulary>pollution</vocabulary>. If it's bad enough it really is like a dye, too, making your white clothes brown, yuck.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
